reviewText:
The DVD "When the Men Sing" as performed in Moscow's Kremlin Palace Theater the end of 2004 is an incredibly wonderful assault on the senses. The pure harmony and enthusiasm of this talented group permeates the 2+ hours of singing (and dancing,
It is a sheer joy to absorb this hidden gem by a group that is not well known, but brings incredible mastery and professionalism to this varied performance.
